# Volume Skip Tracks Skip tracks when screen is off Play/stop works when the phone is not in deep sleep and a music app has got the audio focus (is playing o was playing not too long ago. When in deep sleep volume keys are not enabled by the system Enable skip tracks Double click play/stop music Long press min time Double click max time Vibrate on long and double click The mod uses system feedback vibration intensity, however it is not needed to enable main system switch for vibration feedback Vibration feedback intensity # Animation Scale

# Icons This option is applied both in user and lock screens. It only applies to main views and system icons Battery Data WiFi Airplane NFC Bluetooth Alarm Screen Cast WiFi Calling/VoLTE WiFi P2P/Mirroring GPS Volume Power Saver Data Saver Hotspot Gear Headset Rotation
